rv - if context needed then add it

irrelevant and POV, plus it's already in the quotes section
/* Censorship of Lenin in the Soviet Union */Hanging order
rv; see Talk page - book is biased and not credible (some parts are "the figment of a Russophobic mind" according to the reviewer)

1. you quoted almost verbatim from the article. that's plagiarism. 2. fake Lenin quotes are a dime a dozen. do you have any proof that it is genuine?

/* Censorship of Lenin in the Soviet Union */ I was right
